Package io.github.shuoros.jfiler

Class JFiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.shuoros.jfiler.JFiler
  • public class JFiler
extends Object
    JFiller is a library for managing files in Java which easily and with the least line of code gives you the ability to manage files like moving through folders and directories, reading files and folders information, creating new files or folders, making changes to files and folders such as renaming or hiding them, deleting files and folders, searching for files or folders by regex and compressing files and folders or extracting them from zip files.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Soroush Shemshadi
    See Also:
    JFiler

      • hide

        public static void hide​(File file)
                 throws IOException
        Hide the given file or folder. If Your machine is Windows its change the file or folders properties to hide it and if your machine is based on unix or mac it will add a dot "." before your desired file or folder's name.
        Parameters:
        file - Your desired file or folder to hide.
        Throws:
        IOException - If anything goes wrong in changing the file properties or changing its name an IOException will be thrown.

      • hide

        public static void hide​(String location)
                 throws IOException
        Hide the given file or folder. If Your machine is Windows its change the file or folders properties to hide it and if your machine is based on unix or mac it will add a dot "." before your desired file or folder's name.
        Parameters:
        location - Location of your desired file or folder to hide.
        Throws:
        IOException - If anything goes wrong in changing the file properties or changing its name an IOException will be thrown.

      • unHide

        public static void unHide​(File file)
                   throws IOException
        Un hides the given file or folder. If Your machine is Windows its change the file or folders properties to un hide it and if your machine is based on unix or mac it will remove the dot "." before your desired file or folder's name.
        Parameters:
        file - Your desired file or folder to un hide.
        Throws:
        IOException - If anything goes wrong in changing the file properties or changing its name an IOException will be thrown.

      • pasteOperation

        public String pasteOperation()
        Returns a string that indicates the operation that the track is about to perform. It can be a copy or a cut or nothing.
        Returns:
        A string that indicates the operation that the track is about to perform. It can be a copy or a cut or NaN.

      • getList

        public List<File> getList()
        Returns list of all files and folders in current location of JFiler.
        Returns:
        List of all files and folders in current location of JFiler.

      • openFolder

        public void openFolder​(String location)
        Opens a folder in the given location in JFiler's current location. The current location will be added to rear location and the folder you give to function will be set in current location. If home is locked and the given location is outside of home it throws LocationNotFoundException.
        Parameters:
        location - Location of desired folder which you want to open.

      • goBackward

        public void goBackward()
        Goes backward to the last rear location of JFiler. The current location will be added to front location and last rear location will be set in current location. If there is no backward history it throws NoBackwardHistoryException.

      • goForward

        public void goForward()
        Goes forward to the last front location of JFiler. The current location will be added to rear location and last front location will be set in current location. If there is no forward history it throws NoForwardHistoryException.

      • goUp

        public void goUp()
        Goes up to the parent of current location of JFiler. The current location will be added to front location and parent of current location will be set in current location. If home is locked and parent of current location is outside of home it throws LocationNotFoundException.

      • cut

        public void cut​(String source)
        Saves your desired file or folder in clipboard and set pasting operation to cut method.
        Parameters:
        source - Location of your desired file or folder you want to cut.

      • copy

        public void copy​(String source)
        Saves your desired file or folder in clipboard and set pasting operation to copy method.
        Parameters:
        source - Location of your desired file or folder you want to copy.

      • paste

        public void paste​(String destination)
           throws IOException
        Pastes the file or folder in clipboard in your desired destination with pasting operation you choose before "copy/cut".
        Parameters:
        destination - Location which you want to copy or cut file or folder in clipboard.
        Throws:
        IOException - If anything goes wrong in coping or cutting an IOException will be thrown.

      • delete

        public void delete​(String destination)
            throws IOException
        Deletes your desired file or folder.
        Parameters:
        destination - Location of file or folder you want to delete.
        Throws:
        IOException - If anything goes wrong in deleting file or folder an IOException will be thrown.
